title: The Wesley Peterson Mystery Collection
description:
Audio Books : Mystery and Suspense : Other quality : English

All are unabridged.
Narrators include Peter Wickham, Andrew Wincott, Gordon Griffin and Grahame Roberts .



Kate Ellis is one of my favorite authors. She writes excellent modern day British Police procedural mysteries with a touch of history and a bit of archaeology!
I previously made this series available here as a set in 2011. Here it is again as requested, but this time I've added another three titles.
(As far as I am aware, books 2 to 8 have never been released in audio format)

#1. *The Merchants House* [9 hours 15 mins] Cassettes (1998) Read by Grahame Roberts, 32kbps


#9. *A Cursed Inheritance* [12 hours 30 mins] Cassettes (2005) Read by Peter Wickham, 32kbps


#10. *The Marriage Hearse* [10 hours 26 mins] Cassettes (2006) Read by Peter Wickham, 32kbps


#11. *The Shining Skull* [11 hours] CD (2007) Read by Peter Wickham, 48kbps


#12. *The Blood Pit* [11 hours 41 mins] CD (2008) Read by Peter Wickham, 32kbps


#13. *A Perfect Death* [ 11 hours 7 mins ] CD (2009) Read by Peter Wickham, 48kbps


#14. *The Flesh Tailor* [ 10 hours 44 mins ] CD (2010) Read by Peter Wickham, 32kbps (Thanks to Icemaiden)


#15. *The Jackel Man* [ 11 hours 19 mins ] CD (2011) Read by Andrew Wincott, 48kbps (Thanks to Icemaiden)


#16. *The Cadaver Game* [ 11 hours 10 mins ] ED, (2012) Read by Gordon Griffin 

#17. *The Shadow Collecter* [ 10 hours 14 mins ] ED (2013) Read by Andrew Wincott, 32kbps (Thanks to Antoek)


#18. *The Shroud Maker* [ 11 hours 26 mins ] ED (2014) Read by Gordon Griffin, 48kbps (Thanks to Antoek)





Enjoy and Seed!!
